title: OGZ Roitz is looking for a Plat+ Top and Mid
body:
OGZ Roitz is a competitive team participating in the OLS which is a LCS style league. We are currently looking for a mid and top laner. If you fulfill the requirements and are interested please sign up below!

Requirements
-Must be Plat+
-Must have a decent champion pool
-Must have an open schedule
-Must have a mic and willing to download teamspeak
-Must be able to play in a bo3 series each week

Application
IGN:
Rank:
Role:
Time Zone:
Availability:

If you have any questions feel free to add me in game (Yaoguai)
